title: Bar showing only women sports games coming to St . Louis

The Sports Bra, a bar dedicated to women's sports, to open in Maplewood The Sports Bra opened its first location in Portland, Oregon in 2022. It was the first of its kind in the U.S.

St. Louis Slam host conference final with hopes of staying on track in WFA title defense The SLAM will host the Minnesota Vixen on Saturday for the right to play in the Pro National Championship on July 26 in Canton, Ohio.
The Sports Bra, a bar dedicated to women's sports, to open in Maplewood The Sports Bra opened its first location in Portland, Oregon in 2022. It was the first of its kind in the U.S.
